<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Returns detail information of all validators.

>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Validator details retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Code indicating the success of the operation."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Additional information or message about the response."},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"inactiveValidatorCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of inactive validators."},"activeValidatorCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of active validators."},"validatorsList":{"type":"array","description":"List of detailed information for each validator.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"stakedHashAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total amount of HASH staked by the validator."},"realtimeHashAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time HASH amount for the validator."},"stakedBTCScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Staked BTC score for the validator."},"stakedCoreScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Staked CORE score for the validator."},"estimatedBTCRewardRate":{"type":"integer","description":"Estimated BTC reward rate for the validator."},"realtimeHashScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time HASH score for the validator."},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the validator."},"realtimeCoreAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time CORE amount for the validator."},"stakedCoreAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total amount of CORE staked by the validator."},"stakedHashScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Staked HASH score for the validator."},"realtimeCoreScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time CORE score for the validator."},"rewardAddress":{"type":"string","description":"Address to receive rewards for the validator."},"consensusAddress":{"type":"string","description":"Consensus address of the validator."},"stakedBTCAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total amount of BTC staked by the validator."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the validator."},"logo":{"type":"string","description":"Logo or image URL of the validator."},"operatorAddress":{"type":"string","description":"Operator address of the validator."},"realtimeBTCScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time BTC score for the validator."},"hybridScore":{"type":"integer","description":"Hybrid score combining metrics of the validator."},"estimatedCoreRewardRate":{"type":"integer","description":"Estimated CORE reward rate for the validator."},"realtimeBTCAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Real-time BTC amount for the validator."},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status of the validator (e.g., active, inactive)."}}}},"realtimeBtcAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Real time BTC amount."},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Integer indicating status."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"An error occurred while retrieving validator details.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code for the operation."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
